snippet: Even as state and local governments struggle to meet higher green energy standards with ever-shrinking budgets, billions of dollars of so-called Qualified Energy Conservation Bonds have gone unused.
abstract: Even as state and local governments struggle to meet higher green energy standards with ever-shrinking budgets, billions of dollars of so-called Qualified Energy Conservation Bonds have gone unused.

headline.main: Few Seize on a U.S. Bond Program Backing Green Energy
headline.print_headline: Few Seize on a U.S. Bond Program Backing Green Energy
